channel.title: Feedback - mangOH forum
channel.description: Topics in the 'Feedback' category What you like and what we could improve.

item.title: Git repository structure
item.dc:creator: ze96
item.description:
Hello!

May I humbly suggest that this project adapt some sort of git structure, e.g. something similar to:

nvie.com

A successful Git branching model

In this post I present a Git branching strategy for developing and releasing software as I’ve used it in many of my projects, and which has turned out to be very successful.

I just got started today with setting up for mangOH Red, but immediately got stuck with the issue in The mangOH repository now uses a Legato 18.05.1 feature

The Sierra Legato page (https://source.sierrawireless.com/resources/airprime/software/legato_application_development_kit_linux/) unfortunately sports a rather old release of Legato, which then downloads the latest master branch of mangOH, causing build breakage.

Unfortunately, the git log of the mangOH repository is very hard to get a grip on when there are no releases or other possible breakage points, so there’s no obvious point to fall back to. At least some tagging and a develop branch would be huge steps forward!

2 posts - 2 participants

Read full topic

item.title: mangOH VM feedback
item.dc:creator: asyal
item.description:
Guys,

We are about to release a VM (March 16) that will allow you to build for WP85,WP75, WP76,WP77 modules. You will only need to execute a 3-5 commands to build for the module of your choice.
However, we would like to get your feedback on:
a. The process
b. Tricks that might help build inside the VM faster

I need a few volunteers, please send me a message.

cheers,
Ashish

32 posts - 9 participants

Read full topic

item.title: Legato Survey - a chance to win a mangOH red!
item.dc:creator: achuang
item.description:
Hello mangOH community,

Legato team wants your feedback! By participating in our Legato Survey you will help us improve Legato and to better your development experience on mangOH! Even better, you’ll be entered to win a MangOH Red!

Suvey link: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/7HDQDB6

Thanks,

item.title: Give your feedback
item.dc:creator: thibs
item.description:
We love feedback!

This is the right place to post your feedback about mangOH or mangOH websites.
We love both positive and negative feedback as long as it is constructive and helps us progress in the right direction.

Please get sure you did introduce yourself first in the water cooler discussions category. We are human; we hear better from people we know.

2 posts - 1 participant
